meta.description: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Schengen, Gate A13) at Frankfurt Airport (FRA), Terminal 1, Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Business Lounge (Schengen, Gate A13)

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.

lounge.description: Relax at the Lufthansa Business Lounge prior to your Schengen departure from Frankfurt. Enjoy a comfortable, peaceful, and modern environment away from the terminal's hustle and bustle. Imbibe at the well-stocked self-serve bar and enjoy a delectable, nourishing meal from the buffet selection. Upgrade your pre-flight experience now.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.
To ensure the health and safety of guests, shower facilities will not be available during this time.
regulatory: This location is located in the Schengen departure area of Terminal 1, Concourse A. Passengers departing from a different concourse or terminal should leave sufficient time to reach their gates, as passengers departing from other concourses may need to take the Skyline Train and pass through additional security checks, and distances may be significant.

LoungeBuddy bookings made for this lounge are NOT valid at any other Lufthansa Lounges located at Frankfurt Airport. Access will be denied if the booking is used at a different Lufthansa Lounge location.
Lounge bookings for this location are limited to non-corporate use. A tax invoice (according to respective taxation laws of selected countries) will not be issued.

reviews.content: Pass for â‚¬39, fair selection of food and drinks, nice space, friendly staff. Crowded by 1900. Limiting entry during a pandemic may be wise, and keeping walkways clear of children.
The main lounge for Schengen flights. Very crowded and busy at 7am. Good food options and drink options. Very nice and clean showers. Friendly staff. But I left because it was just packed.
The lounge itself is decent, but almost always when I visit it is hopelessly overcrowded. People standing around looking for places to sit down. Bad management from LH.
It is large, lots of seating and tables, but was completely packed at 8am. Food options are basic/poor and opted not to eat here. Drink options are great, plenty of coffee, tea, beer, spirits. OK.
Far too small and the food and drink offering is quite poor. Good coffee, shame there's no cake to go with it.
Too crowded. Much prefer the lounge near A26.
Not a bad experience. But not great either. Too crowded and the shower could have been cleaner. But at least it has showers...and beer.
This lounge is fine though can get quite busy.
Busy but spacious and nicely decorated. Coffee and drink buffet with a good buffet. Can't complain.
Free fast wifi, food & drinks, plus power outlets at every seat! Starting to get a little more crowded at 6am, probably pretty tight when the airport is busy.
As mentioned by others, this lounge is extremely crowded and finding a seat is difficult. Good for plane watching and wifi but not too much more than that. The lounge near A25 is quieter.
Good lounge, view on planes but food is a bit limited. Drinks selection is ok. A bit crowded but overall good :)
Functional and satisfactory, even if busy.
A bit too crowded overall, but other than that, this is a good lounge. Try the Air Canada Maple Leaf Lounge if you can.
Every time that I've visited this lounge, it's been extremly crowded. The lounge is modern, but there is limited seating and snack items. There are, however, plenty of drink options.
The lounge has limited seating, and as a result, too crowded. If you wish to access the Wi-Fi, get a scratch card from the front desk.
Such a crowded lounge! Similar to waiting in the gates.

location.terminalDirections: Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
